metadata.title: CVE-2022-28191 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: NVIDIA vGPU software contains a vulnerability in the Virtual GPU Manager(nvidia.ko), where uncontrolled resource consumption can be triggered by anunprivileged regular user, which may lead to denial of service.
